snippet: Wall Street employees may find it hard to celebrate at bonus time. | As large sections of New York and New Jersey still lack basic essentials, some on Wall Street are looking to help out. | Some important issues still haven't been adequately...
abstract: Wall Street employees may find it hard to celebrate at bonus time. | As large sections of New York and New Jersey still lack basic essentials, some on Wall Street are looking to help out. | Some important issues still haven't been adequately addressed in the campaign.
